articles.author: Kelly Heyboer | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: From maggots to 'suicide rooms,' inside N.J.'s immigrant detention centers
articles.description: Asylum seekers and other immigrants in New Jersey detention facilities complain about bad food, dirty water and inadequate medical care, according to a new report.

articles.author: Joe Brandt | For NJ.com
articles.title: Family, friends rally around father who might be deported
articles.description: Cloyd Edralin, 47, left his home in Highland Park this morning to go to work when ICE agents detained him.

articles.author: Alex Napoliello | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Father of 4, in U.S. legally for 30 years, now may be deported
articles.description: Cloyd Edralin, a green card holder, was detained by ICE agents as he left his home in Highland Park on Monday morning.

articles.author: Star-Ledger Guest Columnist
articles.title: I'm an immigration attorney. ICE should stop locking up people for no reason
articles.description: It violates our international treaty obligations to detain immigrants for the purpose of wearing them down until they agree to leave. It is unconstitutional to lock people up awaiting even a criminal trial (which a deportation hearing is not).
